types.name: WACA Membership All Access
types.description: Full access to matches and lounges
benefits: Includes Test Match, ODI, BBL, WBBL and all WA state cricket plus all home Finals
Air-conditioned Members Lounge
Option to upgrade to a Reserved Seat
Option to purchase Visitor Passes to select matches
Reciprocal rights & Member rewards program
Access to intimate offers and Member-first news
No handling fees
Discount on WA Cricket merchandise

types.name: Champions Club Membership

3-course fine dining package and private bar

In-seat beverage service
Access to intimate offers and Member-first news
Reciprocal rights & Member rewards program
No handling fees
Discount on WA Cricket merchandise
